Retrieve information about GitHub Actions workflows and their runs.

Source: R/action.R, R/action_runs.R, R/action_status.R, and 1 more
action.Rd

  • action_workflows() - retrieve details on repo workflows.

  • action_runs() - retrieve details on repo workflow runs.

  • action_status() - retrieve details on most recent workflow runs.

Usage

action_runs(repo, limit = 50)

action_status(repo, branch = NULL, before = NULL, limit = 50)

action_workflows(repo, full = FALSE)

Arguments

repo

Character. Address of repository in owner/name format.

limit

Numeric. Maximum number of workflow runs to return.

branch

Character. Vector of branches to report. Default NULL, returns all branches.

before

Datetime. Remove all runs created after this timestamp. Character values are converted using lubridate::ymd_hms().

full

Logical. Should all workflow columns be returned. Default FALSE.

Value

action_workflows(), action_runs(), and action_status() all return tibbles containing information on requested repos' available workflows, recent action runs, and recent action run statuses respectively.

Examples

# \dontrun{
action_workflows("rundel/ghclass")
#> # A tibble: 3 × 5
#>   name                         id path          state  badge_url                
#>   <chr>                     <int> <chr>         <chr>  <chr>                    
#> 1 R-CMD-check            16380636 .github/work… active https://github.com/runde…
#> 2 Render README            493364 .github/work… active https://github.com/runde…
#> 3 pages-build-deployment 17365478 dynamic/page… active https://github.com/runde…

action_runs("rundel/ghclass")
#> # A tibble: 50 × 7
#>    name                   branch commit  event status result created            
#>    <chr>                  <chr>  <chr>   <chr> <chr>  <chr>  <dttm>             
#>  1 R-CMD-check            master 73a3f5… push  compl… succe… 2022-01-04 21:18:00
#>  2 R-CMD-check            master 2504a6… push  compl… succe… 2022-01-04 21:14:42
#>  3 R-CMD-check            master 8cef02… push  compl… succe… 2021-12-16 19:26:06
#>  4 Render README          0.2.1  73a3f5… push  compl… succe… 2022-01-07 03:27:38
#>  5 Render README          0.2.0  dd1346… push  compl… succe… 2021-11-15 15:13:08
#>  6 Render README          master a21750… push  compl… succe… 2020-10-07 12:25:44
#>  7 pages-build-deployment master 73a3f5… dyna… compl… succe… 2022-01-04 21:18:00
#>  8 pages-build-deployment master 2504a6… dyna… compl… succe… 2022-01-04 21:14:42
#>  9 NA                     master e93049… push  compl… succe… 2021-12-16 19:11:23
#> 10 NA                     master 263698… push  compl… succe… 2021-11-15 15:58:12
#> # … with 40 more rows

action_status(c("rundel/ghclass", "rundel/parsermd"))
#> # A tibble: 21 × 5
#>    repo           name                   branch       result created            
#>    <chr>          <chr>                  <chr>        <chr>  <dttm>             
#>  1 rundel/ghclass R-CMD-check            master       succe… 2022-01-04 21:18:00
#>  2 rundel/ghclass Render README          0.2.1        succe… 2022-01-07 03:27:38
#>  3 rundel/ghclass Render README          0.2.0        succe… 2021-11-15 15:13:08
#>  4 rundel/ghclass Render README          master       succe… 2020-10-07 12:25:44
#>  5 rundel/ghclass pages-build-deployment master       succe… 2022-01-04 21:18:00
#>  6 rundel/ghclass NA                     master       succe… 2021-12-16 19:11:23
#>  7 rundel/ghclass NA                     pat_fix      failu… 2021-11-15 15:14:26
#>  8 rundel/ghclass NA                     0.2.0        succe… 2021-11-15 15:13:08
#>  9 rundel/ghclass NA                     testing      succe… 2021-11-12 21:55:45
#> 10 rundel/ghclass NA                     finnlindgre… failu… 2021-01-28 15:22:09
#> # … with 11 more rows
# }
